org.hps.online.recon

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.online.recon.Client

  • public final class Client
extends Object
    Client for interacting with the online reconstruction server.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean append
      Append rather than overwrite if writing to output file.

      The factory for creating Command objects.

      Command line arguments for the client

      Arguments for the command to run on the server

      Host name of the server
      private boolean interactive
      Run interactive console after command file.

      Package logger.

      The base options (commands have their own Options objects).

      Output file for writing server responses.
      private org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser parser
      Parser for base options.
      private int port
      Port of the server with default from server.
      private PrintWriter pw
      Writer for file output.

      • LOG

        private static Logger LOG
        Package logger.

      • hostName

        private String hostName
        Host name of the server

      • port

        private int port
        Port of the server with default from server.

      • outputFile

        private File outputFile
        Output file for writing server responses. By default it is null, which results in output being written to the console (System.out).

      • parser

        private org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser parser
        Parser for base options.

      • append

        private boolean append
        Append rather than overwrite if writing to output file.

      • interactive

        private boolean interactive
        Run interactive console after command file.

      • cf

        private CommandFactory cf
        The factory for creating Command objects.

      • pw

        private PrintWriter pw
        Writer for file output. If null output is written to System.out.

      • clientArgs

        String[] clientArgs
        Command line arguments for the client

      • cmdArgs

        String[] cmdArgs
        Arguments for the command to run on the server

        Command command
        The client command (which may be null when opening a console or executing a file)

        The base options (commands have their own Options objects).

      • getOutputFile

        File getOutputFile()
        Get the output file for writing server responses. If this is null then server responses are written to System.out.

        The output file for writing server responses

        void setOutputFile(String outputPath)
        Set the path to the output file for writing server responses.
        Parameters:
        outputPath - The output file path or null to print to the terminal

      • setAppend

        void setAppend(boolean append)
        Set whether to append to the output file. By default existing output files are overwritten.
        Parameters:
        append - True to append to the output file

      • getAppend

        boolean getAppend()
        Get whether to append to the output file.
